name: Everon's Quest
description:
Everon's Quest is probably the most stupidest game you will ever play. Its so stupid that you will get into it.

Embark on a journey to do like 1 fetch quest and then the game is over.

Anyway, this isn't really a big game project, it just seemed like RPG Maker 2000 was super cheap and I wanted to make a game with it. And probably all my friends would want to play it, so here!
